name: Healthcare Nonprofit
description: We are a 501(c)(3) patient advocacy organization focused on expanding access to cancer screening and treatment.
orgDescription: We are a 501(c)(3) patient advocacy organization focused on expanding access to cancer screening and treatment. We have a small policy team but no DC presence.
policyGoals: We want to influence upcoming Medicare reimbursement policies and build relationships with key congressional committees overseeing healthcare.
timeline: The next Medicare payment rule is expected in Q2. Our annual advocacy budget is approximately $200,000.

name: Tech Startup (AI Focus)
description: We're a Series B AI startup building enterprise automation tools.
orgDescription: We're a Series B AI startup building enterprise automation tools. About 50 employees, headquartered in San Francisco.
policyGoals: With increasing congressional attention on AI regulation, we need representation to ensure our voice is heard in policy discussions. We want a seat at the table, not reactive damage control.
timeline: AI legislation is moving fast. We want a firm that understands technology but can also navigate the current political environment. Ideally connections to Commerce Committee and relevant executive branch agencies.

name: Manufacturing (Trade Issues)
description: We're a mid-sized manufacturer of industrial equipment facing steel tariffs.
orgDescription: We're a mid-sized manufacturer of industrial equipment with about 200 employees in Ohio. Significant exposure to steel tariffs.
policyGoals: Recent trade policy changes have increased our costs by 15%. We need help navigating tariff exemption processes and advocating for more favorable trade policies.
timeline: Budget is limited but the issue is urgent. Our current exemption expires in 6 months.

name: Veterans Advocacy (Individual)
description: I'm a retired military officer looking to advocate for improved VA mental health services.
orgDescription: I'm a retired military officer (Colonel, U.S. Army) with 28 years of service. I've personally experienced gaps in the VA mental health system.
policyGoals: I want to push for specific legislative changes to improve VA mental health services, particularly for veterans in rural areas.
timeline: I have limited resources but strong personal experience and some media connections. Looking for a firm that has genuine commitment to veterans' issues, not just a contract.

name: Clean Energy Coalition
description: We're a coalition of clean energy companies and environmental groups.
orgDescription: We're a coalition of 15 clean energy companies and 5 environmental groups advocating for renewable energy policy. 501(c)(4) structure.
policyGoals: We're focused on extension of renewable energy tax credits and grid infrastructure investment in the next budget cycle.
timeline: Appropriations process is our window. We need a firm with deep energy policy expertise, relationships with key appropriators, and experience working coalitions. Bipartisan credibility is essential.
